DOC.brief_summary: l'ANI (Analgesia Nociception Index The main objective of the research is to estimate the Analgesia Nociception Index (ANI) as a parameter giving the possibility of measuring the pain in painful metastatic cancer. The parameter ANI is compared with visual analogical scale (VAS) score.
